name: Chicken Game!
description:
In this game you play a chicken, joined together with other animals, each of which have different abilities. Said abilities will help you solve various puzzles throughout the game. (Of which I wish I had more, especially harder ones.)

This game was made for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam.
Sorry for the lack of music and sounds.

Controls:
+ / - keys to change window size, everything else is explained in-game.
Arrow keys also work instead of WASD.

Turns out that arrow keys are broken. Sorry for that, it'll be fixed in a post-jam version.
